name: Calm
description: We will help you regain tranquility and relax your mind.
imagine: Imagine carving out a space just for you, away from noise and thoughts.
helpYou: It will help you slow down the pace, release tension, and regain inner balance.

relaxBody.title: Physical relaxation exercises
relaxBody.description: Release muscle tension with simple guided movements.

shoulder_relax.name: Shoulder relaxation
shoulder_relax.instructions: Lift your shoulders toward your ears, hold for 2 seconds, then slowly relax.

neck_stretch.name: Neck stretching
neck_stretch.instructions: Tilt your head slowly from side to side, holding each position for 5 seconds.

journalPre.prompt: Write what is troubling you and what you can do to release that tension.

journalPost.prompt: Write how you feel now after this session.

spiritual.text: A calm heart is life to the body...

environment.suggestion: Find a quiet place, dim the lights, close your eyes if you can, and listen to these sounds through headphones to immerse yourself better in the atmosphere.
